phases.title: Requirements and System Design
phases.description: Establish comprehensive system requirements, define domain boundaries, design architecture patterns, and create technical specifications for the entire application.

tasks.title: Define Functional Requirements
tasks.description: Document all functional requirements including employee lifecycle management, team operations, equipment tracking, leave management, and role-based access specifications. Create user stories and acceptance criteria for each feature.

tasks.title: Define Non-Functional Requirements
tasks.description: Specify performance requirements, security standards, scalability targets, availability SLAs, and data retention policies. Document compliance requirements and audit trail specifications.

tasks.title: Identify Domain Boundaries
tasks.description: Perform domain analysis to identify bounded contexts: Employee Management, Team Management, Equipment Management, Leave Management, and Authentication. Define relationships and integration points between domains.

tasks.title: Design Domain Models
tasks.description: Create comprehensive domain models for each bounded context including entities, value objects, and aggregates. Define invariants, business rules, and domain events for each aggregate.

tasks.title: Define Event Catalog
tasks.description: Document all domain events that will be raised across the system such as EmployeeHired, EmployeeTerminated, TeamAssigned, EquipmentIssued, LeaveRequested. Specify event payload structures and subscriber mappings.

tasks.title: Design Database Schema
tasks.description: Create detailed database schema with all tables, relationships, indexes, and constraints. Design for both transactional consistency within aggregates and eventual consistency across domains.

tasks.title: Design REST API Structure
tasks.description: Define complete REST API endpoints with request/response schemas, HTTP methods, status codes, pagination strategies, and error handling patterns. Document API versioning strategy.

tasks.title: Design Authentication & Authorization Model
tasks.description: Define role-based access control structure with Admin and Employee roles. Specify permissions matrix, authentication flow using Laravel Sanctum, and token management strategy.

tasks.title: Design Queue Architecture
tasks.description: Define asynchronous job types for heavy operations like notifications, reports, and bulk operations. Specify queue priorities, retry strategies, and failure handling mechanisms.

tasks.title: Create System Architecture Diagram
tasks.description: Produce comprehensive architecture diagrams showing frontend-backend separation, domain boundaries, event flows, database structure, and external integration points.

tasks.title: Define Testing Strategy
tasks.description: Establish comprehensive testing approach including unit tests for domain logic, integration tests for repositories, feature tests for API endpoints, and E2E tests. Define coverage targets and CI/CD pipeline requirements.

tasks.title: Create Development Roadmap
tasks.description: Establish sprint planning, milestone definitions, task prioritization, and resource allocation strategy. Define release schedule and deployment strategy.

phases.title: Backend Core Setup
phases.description: Initialize Laravel 12 project with DDD architecture, configure development environment, establish coding standards, and set up testing infrastructure.

tasks.title: Initialize Laravel 12 Project
tasks.description: Create fresh Laravel 12 installation with PHP 8.2 requirements. Configure composer dependencies and verify installation integrity.

tasks.title: Configure Development Environment
tasks.description: Set up .env configuration for local development including database connections, queue drivers, cache drivers, and mail settings. Configure Docker containers if needed.

tasks.title: Establish DDD Directory Structure
tasks.description: Create DDD-compliant folder structure with src/Domains, src/Application, src/Infrastructure directories. Set up namespace autoloading in composer.json for domain-driven organization.

tasks.title: Install Core Dependencies
tasks.description: Install Laravel Filament, Laravel Sanctum, and other essential packages. Configure package versions and ensure compatibility with PHP 8.3 and Laravel 12.

tasks.title: Configure Code Quality Tools
tasks.description: Install and configure Laravel Pint for code formatting, PHPStan for static analysis, and PHP CS Fixer. Set up pre-commit hooks to enforce code standards.

tasks.title: Set Up Pest Testing Framework
tasks.description: Install Pest with Laravel plugin, configure pest.php, and create test directory structure aligned with DDD architecture. Set up parallel testing configuration.

tasks.title: Configure Database Connections
tasks.description: Set up primary database connection, configure migration settings, and establish database naming conventions. Configure separate test database for isolation.

tasks.title: Configure Queue Infrastructure
tasks.description: Set up queue configuration with database or Redis driver. Configure queue workers, job batching, and failure handling. Create supervisor configuration for production.

tasks.title: Configure Event System
tasks.description: Set up Laravel event discovery, configure event-listener mappings, and establish event naming conventions. Configure queue settings for asynchronous event handling.

tasks.title: Create Base Repository Interface
tasks.description: Define generic repository interface with CRUD operations and query methods. Establish repository pattern contracts that domain repositories will implement.

tasks.title: Create Base Service Classes
tasks.description: Implement abstract base classes for application services including common patterns for command handling, validation, and transaction management.

tasks.title: Set Up Exception Handling
tasks.description: Create custom exception hierarchy for domain exceptions, application exceptions, and infrastructure exceptions. Configure global exception handler with proper HTTP status mapping.

tasks.title: Configure Logging and Monitoring
tasks.description: Set up comprehensive logging strategy with different channels for application logs, audit logs, and security logs. Configure log rotation and retention policies.

tasks.title: Create Base Test Cases
tasks.description: Develop base test case classes for unit tests, integration tests, and feature tests. Include helper methods for common testing scenarios and database seeding.

tasks.title: Set Up CI/CD Pipeline Configuration
tasks.description: Create GitHub Actions or GitLab CI configuration for automated testing, code quality checks, and deployment processes. Define pipeline stages and environment-specific configurations.

phases.title: DDD Domain Construction
phases.description: Build the core domain layer with entities, value objects, aggregates, domain events, and business logic for all bounded contexts.

tasks.title: Create Shared Kernel
tasks.description: Implement shared value objects used across domains such as Email, PhoneNumber, Address, and Money. Create shared domain events and interfaces.

tasks.title: Build Employee Domain - Entities
tasks.description: Implement Employee aggregate root with entity methods for hiring, termination, position changes, and location changes. Include all business rules and invariants.

tasks.title: Build Employee Domain - Value Objects
tasks.description: Create value objects for EmployeeId, Position, Salary, EmploymentStatus, WorkLocation, and RemoteWorkPolicy. Implement validation and immutability.

tasks.title: Build Employee Domain - Events
tasks.description: Implement domain events: EmployeeHired, EmployeeTerminated, PositionChanged, LocationChanged, RemoteWorkEnabled. Include complete event payload structures.

tasks.title: Build Employee Domain - Repository
tasks.description: Define EmployeeRepository interface with methods for finding, storing, and querying employees. Include specifications for complex queries.

tasks.title: Build Team Domain - Entities
tasks.description: Implement Team aggregate root with methods for creating teams, assigning members, removing members, and changing team leads. Enforce team size and composition rules.

tasks.title: Build Team Domain - Value Objects
tasks.description: Create value objects for TeamId, TeamName, TeamType, and MemberRole. Implement business rules for valid team configurations.

tasks.title: Build Team Domain - Events
tasks.description: Implement domain events: TeamCreated, EmployeeAssignedToTeam, EmployeeRemovedFromTeam, TeamLeadChanged, TeamDisbanded.

tasks.title: Build Team Domain - Repository
tasks.description: Define TeamRepository interface with methods for team CRUD operations, member queries, and team hierarchy navigation.

tasks.title: Build Equipment Domain - Entities
tasks.description: Implement Equipment aggregate root with methods for issuing, returning, transferring, and tracking hardware. Include equipment lifecycle management.

tasks.title: Build Equipment Domain - Value Objects
tasks.description: Create value objects for EquipmentId, EquipmentType, SerialNumber, EquipmentStatus, and MaintenanceSchedule. Implement validation rules.

tasks.title: Build Equipment Domain - Events
tasks.description: Implement domain events: EquipmentIssued, EquipmentReturned, EquipmentTransferred, MaintenanceScheduled, EquipmentDecommissioned.

tasks.title: Build Equipment Domain - Repository
tasks.description: Define EquipmentRepository interface with methods for equipment tracking, assignment history, and availability queries.

tasks.title: Build Leave Domain - Entities
tasks.description: Implement Leave aggregate root with methods for requesting leave, approving, rejecting, and canceling. Include leave balance tracking and business rules for leave policies.

tasks.title: Build Leave Domain - Value Objects
tasks.description: Create value objects for LeaveId, LeaveType (Vacation, Sick, Unpaid), LeavePeriod, LeaveBalance, and LeaveStatus. Implement accrual calculations.

tasks.title: Build Leave Domain - Events
tasks.description: Implement domain events: LeaveRequested, LeaveApproved, LeaveRejected, LeaveCancelled, LeaveBalanceUpdated.

tasks.title: Build Leave Domain - Repository
tasks.description: Define LeaveRepository interface with methods for leave request management, balance tracking, and calendar queries.

tasks.title: Implement Domain Event Handlers
tasks.description: Create event listeners for cross-domain event handling. Implement eventual consistency patterns where events from one domain trigger updates in another.

phases.title: Authentication & Authorization
phases.description: Implement secure authentication system with Laravel Sanctum, role-based access control, and permission management.

tasks.title: Configure Laravel Sanctum
tasks.description: Install and configure Laravel Sanctum for API token authentication. Set up token abilities, expiration policies, and secure token storage.

tasks.title: Create User Model Extensions
tasks.description: Extend Laravel User model with custom attributes for employee relationship, role assignments, and permission caching. Implement necessary relationships.

tasks.title: Implement Role System
tasks.description: Create Role entity with Admin and Employee roles. Implement role assignment, role checking methods, and database structure for role management.

tasks.title: Implement Permission System
tasks.description: Define granular permissions for all system operations. Create permission checking middleware, gates, and policies. Implement permission inheritance for roles.

tasks.title: Create Authentication API Endpoints
tasks.description: Implement REST endpoints for login, logout, token refresh, and password reset. Include rate limiting and brute force protection.

tasks.title: Implement Registration Flow
tasks.description: Create registration endpoint with email verification, initial role assignment, and welcome notifications. Implement registration business rules.

tasks.title: Create Authorization Middleware
tasks.description: Implement middleware for route protection, role checking, and permission verification. Create middleware for admin-only routes.

tasks.title: Implement Password Policies
tasks.description: Create password complexity requirements, password expiration policies, and password history tracking. Implement secure password hashing with bcrypt.

tasks.title: Create Session Management
tasks.description: Implement active session tracking, device management, and forced logout capabilities. Create endpoints for viewing and revoking active sessions.

tasks.title: Implement Audit Logging for Auth
tasks.description: Create comprehensive audit trail for authentication events including login attempts, password changes, role changes, and permission modifications.

tasks.title: Create Authorization Policies
tasks.description: Implement Laravel policies for all domain resources. Define authorization logic for employee, team, equipment, and leave operations based on roles and ownership.

tasks.title: Write Authentication Tests
tasks.description: Create comprehensive test suite for authentication flows, token management, password reset, and session handling. Test security vulnerabilities and edge cases.

tasks.title: Write Authorization Tests
tasks.description: Create test suite for role-based access control, permission checking, and policy enforcement. Test privilege escalation scenarios.

phases.title: Employee Management Module
phases.description: Implement complete employee management functionality including CRUD operations, lifecycle management, and associated API endpoints.

tasks.title: Create Employee Database Migration
tasks.description: Create migration for employees table with all required fields including personal information, employment details, position, location, and remote work settings. Include proper indexes and foreign keys.

tasks.title: Implement Employee Repository

tasks.title: Create Employee DTOs
tasks.description: Implement Data Transfer Objects for CreateEmployeeRequest, UpdateEmployeeRequest, EmployeeResponse, and EmployeeListResponse. Include validation rules.

tasks.title: Implement Employee Application Service
tasks.description: Create EmployeeService with methods for hiring, updating, terminating employees. Implement business logic orchestration and transaction management.

tasks.title: Create Employee API Controller
tasks.description: Implement RESTful controller for employee endpoints: GET /api/employees, POST /api/employees, GET /api/employees/:id, PUT /api/employees/:id, DELETE /api/employees/:id. Include proper HTTP status codes.

tasks.title: Implement Employee Position Change
tasks.description: Create endpoint and service method for changing employee positions. Include position history tracking, effective dates, and salary adjustments.

tasks.title: Implement Employee Location Management
tasks.description: Create functionality for changing employee office locations. Include location history tracking and remote work configuration.

tasks.title: Implement Remote Work Configuration
tasks.description: Create endpoints for enabling/disabling remote work, setting remote work policies, and tracking remote work schedules.

tasks.title: Implement Employee Termination
tasks.description: Create termination workflow including termination endpoint, exit date handling, equipment return triggers, and access revocation. Implement soft delete with termination reason.

tasks.title: Create Employee Search and Filtering
tasks.description: Implement advanced search with filters for status, position, location, team, and hire date. Include full-text search capabilities.

tasks.title: Implement Employee Event Listeners
tasks.description: Create event listeners for EmployeeHired, EmployeeTerminated, PositionChanged events to trigger notifications, audit logs, and cross-domain updates.

tasks.title: Create Employee Validation Rules
tasks.description: Implement comprehensive validation for employee data including email uniqueness, phone format, hire date logic, and required field validation.

tasks.title: Implement Employee History Tracking
tasks.description: Create audit trail for all employee changes including position history, location history, and salary changes. Implement endpoints for viewing history.

tasks.title: Create Employee Factory and Seeders
tasks.description: Implement factory for generating test employee data and seeders for populating development database with realistic employee records.

tasks.title: Write Employee Domain Tests
tasks.description: Create unit tests for Employee entity business logic, value objects, and domain rules. Test all invariants and edge cases.

tasks.title: Write Employee API Tests
tasks.description: Create feature tests for all employee API endpoints including authorization checks, validation errors, and success scenarios.

tasks.title: Write Employee Integration Tests
tasks.description: Create integration tests for employee service layer, repository interactions, and event dispatching.

phases.title: Team Management Module
phases.description: Implement team management functionality including team CRUD, member assignment, team transfers, and hierarchical team structures.

tasks.title: Create Team Database Migrations
tasks.description: Create migrations for teams table and team_members pivot table. Include team hierarchy support, team metadata, and member role tracking.

tasks.title: Implement Team Repository
tasks.description: Create concrete implementation of TeamRepository with methods for team CRUD, member management queries, and team hierarchy navigation.

tasks.title: Create Team DTOs
tasks.description: Implement DTOs for CreateTeamRequest, UpdateTeamRequest, AssignMemberRequest, TeamResponse, and TeamMemberResponse with validation.

tasks.title: Implement Team Application Service
tasks.description: Create TeamService with methods for creating teams, assigning members, removing members, transferring between teams, and disbanding teams.

tasks.title: Create Team API Controller
tasks.description: Implement RESTful controller for team endpoints: GET /api/teams, POST /api/teams, GET /api/teams/:id, PUT /api/teams/:id, DELETE /api/teams/:id.

tasks.title: Implement Team Member Assignment
tasks.description: Create endpoint POST /api/teams/:id/members for assigning employees to teams. Include business rules for maximum team size and role constraints.

tasks.title: Implement Team Member Removal
tasks.description: Create endpoint DELETE /api/teams/:id/members/:employeeId for removing employees from teams. Handle team lead removal scenarios.

tasks.title: Implement Employee Team Transfer
tasks.description: Create endpoint POST /api/employees/:id/transfer for transferring employees between teams. Implement atomic transfer with history tracking.

tasks.title: Implement Team Hierarchy Management
tasks.description: Create functionality for parent-child team relationships, team hierarchy queries, and organizational structure visualization endpoints.

tasks.title: Implement Team Lead Management
tasks.description: Create endpoints for assigning and changing team leads. Include validation that team lead must be team member and business rules for lead transitions.

tasks.title: Create Team Statistics Endpoints
tasks.description: Implement endpoints for team statistics including member count, equipment assigned to team, active leave requests, and team performance metrics.

tasks.title: Implement Team Event Listeners
tasks.description: Create event listeners for TeamCreated, EmployeeAssignedToTeam, EmployeeRemovedFromTeam events to trigger notifications and update related domains.

tasks.title: Create Team Search and Filtering
tasks.description: Implement search and filtering for teams by name, type, lead, member count, and department. Include sorting and pagination.

tasks.title: Create Team Factory and Seeders
tasks.description: Implement factory for generating test team data with realistic team structures and member assignments for development environment.

tasks.title: Write Team Domain Tests
tasks.description: Create unit tests for Team aggregate business logic, member assignment rules, and team hierarchy constraints.

tasks.title: Write Team API Tests
tasks.description: Create feature tests for all team API endpoints including member assignment, transfers, and authorization checks.

tasks.title: Write Team Integration Tests
tasks.description: Create integration tests for cross-domain interactions between team and employee domains, event handling, and transaction consistency.

phases.title: Equipment Management Module
phases.description: Implement hardware and equipment tracking system including issuing equipment, returns, transfers, maintenance, and inventory management.

tasks.title: Create Equipment Database Migrations
tasks.description: Create migrations for equipment table and equipment_assignments table. Include equipment specifications, purchase information, warranty tracking, and assignment history.

tasks.title: Implement Equipment Repository
tasks.description: Create concrete implementation of EquipmentRepository with methods for inventory management, assignment tracking, and availability queries.

tasks.title: Create Equipment DTOs
tasks.description: Implement DTOs for CreateEquipmentRequest, IssueEquipmentRequest, ReturnEquipmentRequest, EquipmentResponse with validation rules.

tasks.title: Implement Equipment Application Service
tasks.description: Create EquipmentService with methods for adding equipment, issuing to employees, returning, transferring, and decommissioning equipment.

tasks.title: Create Equipment API Controller
tasks.description: Implement RESTful controller for equipment endpoints: GET /api/equipment, POST /api/equipment, GET /api/equipment/:id, PUT /api/equipment/:id, DELETE /api/equipment/:id.

tasks.title: Implement Equipment Issuance
tasks.description: Create endpoint POST /api/equipment/:id/issue for issuing equipment to employees. Include validation for equipment availability and employee eligibility.

tasks.title: Implement Equipment Return
tasks.description: Create endpoint POST /api/equipment/:id/return for processing equipment returns. Include condition assessment and refurbishment workflow initiation.

tasks.title: Implement Equipment Transfer
tasks.description: Create endpoint POST /api/equipment/:id/transfer for transferring equipment between employees. Implement approval workflow for expensive equipment.

tasks.title: Implement Equipment Maintenance Tracking
tasks.description: Create functionality for scheduling maintenance, logging maintenance activities, and tracking equipment health. Include maintenance reminder notifications.

tasks.title: Implement Equipment Inventory Management
tasks.description: Create endpoints for inventory queries, availability checks, and stock level monitoring. Include low stock alerts and reorder recommendations.

tasks.title: Create Equipment Assignment History
tasks.description: Implement endpoints for viewing complete assignment history of equipment and all equipment assigned to specific employee with date ranges.

tasks.title: Implement Equipment Event Listeners
tasks.description: Create event listeners for EquipmentIssued, EquipmentReturned, MaintenanceScheduled events. Trigger notifications to employees and administrators.

tasks.title: Create Equipment Search and Filtering
tasks.description: Implement advanced search for equipment by type, status, assigned employee, location, and purchase date. Include equipment specification search.

tasks.title: Implement Automated Equipment Recovery
tasks.description: Create queue job that automatically triggers equipment return process when employee is terminated. Send notifications to IT department.

tasks.title: Create Equipment Factory and Seeders
tasks.description: Implement factory for generating test equipment data with various types, statuses, and assignment scenarios for development environment.

tasks.title: Write Equipment Domain Tests
tasks.description: Create unit tests for Equipment aggregate business logic, assignment rules, and maintenance scheduling constraints.

tasks.title: Write Equipment API Tests
tasks.description: Create feature tests for all equipment API endpoints including issuance, returns, transfers, and authorization checks.

tasks.title: Write Equipment Integration Tests
tasks.description: Create integration tests for equipment-employee interactions, automated recovery on termination, and event-driven workflows.

phases.title: Leave / Vacation / Sick Days Module
phases.description: Implement comprehensive leave management system with vacation tracking, sick leave, leave balances, approval workflows, and calendar integration.

tasks.title: Create Leave Database Migrations
tasks.description: Create migrations for leave_requests table and leave_balances table. Include leave types, approval workflow, balance accrual tracking, and carry-over policies.

tasks.title: Implement Leave Repository
tasks.description: Create concrete implementation of LeaveRepository with methods for leave request management, balance queries, and calendar conflict checking.

tasks.title: Create Leave DTOs
tasks.description: Implement DTOs for CreateLeaveRequest, ApproveLeaveRequest, RejectLeaveRequest, LeaveResponse, LeaveBalanceResponse with validation.

tasks.title: Implement Leave Application Service
tasks.description: Create LeaveService with methods for requesting leave, approving, rejecting, canceling, and managing leave balances. Include accrual calculation logic.

tasks.title: Create Leave API Controller
tasks.description: Implement RESTful controller for leave endpoints: GET /api/leaves, POST /api/leaves, GET /api/leaves/:id, PUT /api/leaves/:id, DELETE /api/leaves/:id.

tasks.title: Implement Leave Request Submission
tasks.description: Create endpoint POST /api/leaves for submitting leave requests. Include validation for sufficient balance, date conflicts, and minimum notice periods.

tasks.title: Implement Leave Approval Workflow
tasks.description: Create endpoints POST /api/leaves/:id/approve and POST /api/leaves/:id/reject for manager approval. Include approval chain for extended leaves.

tasks.title: Implement Leave Balance Management
tasks.description: Create endpoints GET /api/employees/:id/leave-balance for viewing balances. Implement balance accrual calculation and annual reset logic.

tasks.title: Implement Leave Types Configuration
tasks.description: Create system for configuring different leave types (Vacation, Sick, Unpaid) with different accrual rates, carry-over rules, and approval requirements.

tasks.title: Implement Leave Calendar
tasks.description: Create endpoint GET /api/leaves/calendar for viewing team leave calendar. Include conflict detection for team capacity and holiday overlap checking.

tasks.title: Implement Leave Cancellation
tasks.description: Create endpoint POST /api/leaves/:id/cancel for canceling approved leaves. Implement balance restoration and cancellation deadline policies.

tasks.title: Create Leave Accrual Job
tasks.description: Implement scheduled queue job for automatic leave balance accrual. Run monthly or per pay period to update employee leave balances.

tasks.title: Implement Leave Event Listeners
tasks.description: Create event listeners for LeaveRequested, LeaveApproved, LeaveRejected events. Trigger email notifications to employees and managers.

tasks.title: Create Leave Reports
tasks.description: Implement endpoints for leave analytics: usage reports, pending approvals dashboard, team absence forecast, and balance utilization statistics.

tasks.title: Implement Leave Conflict Detection
tasks.description: Create business logic for detecting overlapping leave requests, team capacity constraints, and blackout period enforcement.

tasks.title: Create Leave Factory and Seeders
tasks.description: Implement factory for generating test leave requests and balances with various statuses and historical data for development environment.

tasks.title: Write Leave Domain Tests
tasks.description: Create unit tests for Leave aggregate business logic, balance calculations, accrual rules, and approval workflow constraints.

tasks.title: Write Leave API Tests
tasks.description: Create feature tests for all leave API endpoints including request submission, approval workflow, cancellation, and authorization checks.

tasks.title: Create Filament User Resource

tasks.description: Build comprehensive admin dashboard with widgets for key metrics: total employees, active leaves, pending approvals, equipment utilization, and recent activities.

tasks.title: Implement Advanced Filters
tasks.description: Create custom Filament filters for each resource including date ranges, status filters, relationship filters, and saved filter presets.

tasks.title: Create Bulk Actions

tasks.title: Implement Custom Filament Pages

tasks.title: Create Relationship Managers

tasks.title: Implement Filament Notifications
tasks.description: Configure Filament notification system for admin actions, approval workflows, and system alerts. Create notification preferences.

tasks.title: Create Export Functionality
tasks.description: Implement data export features for all resources supporting CSV, Excel, and PDF formats. Include custom export column configuration.

tasks.title: Implement Import Functionality
tasks.description: Create data import features for bulk employee creation, equipment inventory uploads, and initial system setup. Include validation and error reporting.

tasks.title: Create Audit Log Viewer
tasks.description: Build comprehensive audit log viewer in Filament showing all system changes with user tracking, timestamps, and change details. Include advanced search.

tasks.title: Implement Global Search
tasks.description: Configure Filament global search to search across employees, teams, equipment, and leave requests. Include search result ranking and recent searches.

tasks.title: Customize Filament Theme
tasks.description: Create custom Filament theme matching corporate branding with custom colors, fonts, and layout modifications. Ensure responsive design.

tasks.title: Configure TailwindCSS
tasks.description: Install and configure TailwindCSS with custom design system, color palette, typography settings, and responsive breakpoints. Set up JIT mode.

tasks.title: Set Up Vue Router
tasks.description: Install Vue Router, configure route structure with lazy loading, implement navigation guards for authentication, and create route middleware system.

tasks.title: Configure Pinia Store

tasks.title: Create User Profile View
tasks.description: Build user profile page for viewing and editing personal information, changing password, viewing leave balances, and assigned equipment.

tasks.title: Implement Role-Based UI
tasks.description: Add conditional rendering based on user roles. Show/hide admin features, restrict actions for regular employees, and implement permission-based routing.

tasks.title: Create Reports and Analytics Views
tasks.description: Build reports page with charts for employee statistics, team composition, equipment utilization, and leave analytics. Use Chart.js or similar library.

tasks.title: Implement Search Functionality
tasks.description: Create global search feature for finding employees, teams, and equipment. Include search results page with filtering and result previews.

tasks.title: Optimize Performance
tasks.description: Implement lazy loading for routes, optimize bundle size, add caching strategies for API responses, and implement virtual scrolling for large lists.

tasks.title: Add PWA Support
tasks.description: Configure Progressive Web App features including service workers, offline support, app manifest, and install prompts for mobile devices.

tasks.title: Write Frontend Tests
tasks.description: Create component tests using Vitest and Vue Test Utils. Write E2E tests using Playwright or Cypress for critical user flows.

tasks.title: Perform Integration Testing
tasks.description: Conduct comprehensive integration testing between frontend and backend. Test all API endpoints, error scenarios, and edge cases.

tasks.title: Accessibility Audit
tasks.description: Perform accessibility audit ensuring WCAG 2.1 AA compliance. Add ARIA labels, keyboard navigation, screen reader support, and focus management.

tasks.title: Cross-Browser Testing
tasks.description: Test application across major browsers (Chrome, Firefox, Safari, Edge) and mobile devices. Fix compatibility issues and ensure consistent experience.

tasks.title: Performance Optimization
tasks.description: Conduct performance audit, optimize image loading, implement code splitting, minimize JavaScript bundle, and achieve Lighthouse score >90.

tasks.title: Security Hardening
tasks.description: Implement security best practices including XSS prevention, CSRF protection, secure token storage, input sanitization, and CSP headers.

tasks.title: Documentation and Handover
tasks.description: Create comprehensive documentation including API documentation, component documentation, deployment guide, and user manual.

phases.title: Quality Assurance and Deployment
phases.description: Comprehensive testing, performance optimization, security audit, and production deployment preparation.

tasks.title: Execute Full Test Suite
tasks.description: Run complete test suite including unit tests, integration tests, and feature tests across all domains. Ensure 90%+ code coverage.

tasks.title: Perform Load Testing
tasks.description: Conduct load testing using tools like Apache JMeter or k6. Test API endpoints under high concurrent user load and identify bottlenecks.

tasks.title: Execute Security Audit
tasks.description: Perform comprehensive security audit checking for SQL injection, XSS, CSRF, authentication bypasses, and other OWASP Top 10 vulnerabilities.

tasks.title: Optimize Database Performance
tasks.description: Analyze and optimize database queries, add missing indexes, implement query caching, and optimize N+1 query problems.

tasks.title: Configure Production Environment
tasks.description: Set up production server environment with PHP 8.2, database, Redis for queues and cache, configure web server (Nginx), and SSL certificates.

tasks.title: Configure Queue Workers
tasks.description: Set up Laravel queue workers with supervisor for production. Configure worker scaling, failure handling, and monitoring.

tasks.title: Configure Backup Strategy
tasks.description: Implement automated database backup with retention policies, implement application file backup, and test restore procedures.

tasks.title: Set Up Monitoring
tasks.description: Configure application monitoring with tools like New Relic or Sentry. Set up error tracking, performance monitoring, and alerting.

tasks.title: Configure Logging Infrastructure
tasks.description: Set up centralized logging with ELK stack or similar. Configure log aggregation, log rotation, and log analysis dashboards.

tasks.title: Create Deployment Pipeline
tasks.description: Create automated deployment pipeline with zero-downtime deployment, rollback capabilities, and environment-specific configurations.

tasks.title: Configure CDN
tasks.description: Set up CDN for static assets including frontend bundle, images, and fonts. Configure cache headers and invalidation strategies.

tasks.title: Perform UAT
tasks.description: Conduct User Acceptance Testing with stakeholders. Document feedback, prioritize issues, and implement critical fixes.

tasks.title: Create Runbooks
tasks.description: Create operational runbooks for common scenarios: deployment, rollback, database migration, queue management, and incident response.

tasks.title: Prepare Production Data
tasks.description: Create production database seeders for initial data: roles, leave types, equipment categories. Prepare data migration scripts if migrating from existing system.

tasks.title: Configure Rate Limiting
tasks.description: Implement API rate limiting to prevent abuse. Configure different limits for authenticated and anonymous requests.

tasks.title: Execute Staging Deployment
tasks.description: Deploy application to staging environment. Perform smoke tests, verify all integrations, and test with staging data.

tasks.title: Conduct Performance Benchmarking
tasks.description: Establish performance benchmarks for key operations. Document baseline metrics for response times, throughput, and resource utilization.

tasks.title: Execute Production Deployment
tasks.description: Deploy application to production environment following deployment checklist. Monitor deployment, verify health checks, and confirm all services are operational.

tasks.title: Post-Deployment Verification
tasks.description: Perform post-deployment verification checks including smoke tests, critical path testing, and monitoring for errors or performance issues.

tasks.title: Create Support Documentation
tasks.description: Create support documentation for help desk including common issues, troubleshooting guides, FAQ, and escalation procedures.

tasks.title: Conduct Team Training
tasks.description: Conduct training sessions for administrators and end users. Create training materials, video tutorials, and hands-on workshop sessions.

tasks.title: Establish SLA and Support
tasks.description: Define Service Level Agreements, establish support channels, create on-call rotation, and set up incident management procedures.
